humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, there were two sentinel lymph nodes biopsied and both were negative for metastatic carcinoma (0/2). Based on the rules provided, this corresponds to N0, which indicates no metastatic carcinoma in sentinel lymph nodes and regional lymph nodes. This is also supported by New Rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that two sentinel lymph nodes were biopsied and both were negative for cancer (0/2). This corresponds to a pathologic N stage of N0, which means no regional lymph node metastasis.
